data.event: The Apostolic Vicariate of Wamba was established in 1949 and was promoted to the Diocese of Wamba in 1959.

event.title: was promoted to the Diocese of Wamba in 1959

data.event: The Apostolic Vicariate of Wamba was established in 1949 and was promoted to the Diocese of Wamba in 1959.
During the Simba Rebellion, in December 1964 rebels held 250 white hostages in Wamba.

event.title: reached the town at the end of the year

data.event: Two mercenary rescue columns reached the town at the end of the year.
